snippet: Villagers in eastern Ukraine have said they saw a missile flying directly overhead just before a Malaysian airliner was shot down last July, providing the most detailed accounts to date.
abstract: Ukraine villagers say they saw missile just before Malaysian airliner was shot down in July 2014, challenging Russian claims that plane was shot down by Ukraine's military.
lead_paragraph: Villagers in eastern Ukraine have said they saw a missile flying directly overhead just before a Malaysian airliner was shot down last July, providing the most detailed accounts to date.

headline.main: Ukraine: Villagers Say They Saw Missile Just Before Civilian Jet Was Shot Down
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: Villagers Say They Saw Missile Just Before Civilian Jet Was Shot Down
